name: StoryArcana
description:
An open world wizard school RPG with a large focus on mystery solving, exploration, puzzles and a combat system based around intricate spell-casting! Clay Quilt is an ordinary boy transported to a magical realm and enrolled into a year of wizardry studies as part of an exchange programme.

Relive your life as the protagonist of your own world of wizardry
Become the only wizard in the world of Nox from Earth! Learn about this new world full of wizard duels and puzzles for those with a magical mind!

Balance your academics and mystery solving
Solve mysteries and help out the locals in Noxrose City to earn money to upgrade your wand, buy new brooms.

Side activities for your daily school life
Participate in our own Broom sport (tentatively named Broom Soccer) or play cards against other wizard students.
